website_summaries.verdict: Between her spot-on superhero style, ability to strike any action pose, and premium attention to detail, you couldn’t ask for a better Wonder Woman and Barbie crossover.
pros: Features Lasso of Truth, sword, and shield accessories

customer_reviews.title: It can be displayed as a nice action figure
customer_reviews.text: It’s a very nice collectible piece by Barbie. I’m a Wonder Woman fan and I display them with my collection which is very nice thanks to the fact that these Barbies are more like an action figures.
customer_reviews.author: maor

customer_reviews.title: Great Wonder Woman action doll
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful!! Highly moveable / posable barbie ... fantastic detail and costuming down to woven lasso . If you are a Wonder Woman fa this is the collectible doll to get !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful doll.
customer_reviews.text: I removed her outfit and made her girly girl. She has a very beautiful face. Her hands were painted, I used non-acetone nail polish remover to remove the paint.
customer_reviews.author: Rain V

customer_reviews.title: lovely doll!
customer_reviews.text: glad barbie is working with dc for this! i love that it's not just a "barbie as wonderwoman" type thing- the doll's molds are very clearly made to look like gal gadot as diana. it's a really beautiful doll, wonderful detail. i should note that her limbs are certainly not as mobile as, say, the made to move series. i really wish i could pose her with her arms crossed in the traditional wonder woman pose. however, she's perfect in every other way.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: A gift for mom !
customer_reviews.text: Awesome doll. A collectible for my mothers 51 birthday. She’s my Wonder Woman . She lives in Florida and it arrived just In time during this pandemic . Thank you amazon for allowing me to send it over to Florida . She really loved it . I had included a gift note that was never included , which was a bummer . She’s a big MUSH like myself and would have treasured the sweet words ... but during this crisis , things get overlooked and I understand that .. Thank you amazon
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: This is based on a popular doll.
customer_reviews.text: With barbie@, you get more realistic look to your wonder woman action figure than other manufacturers. Barbie makes a really great costume that others do poorly or rarely good. Take the example the mego corp in its wonder woman in 8 in, the costume fits very poorly and looks like a potato sack fit in the legs.
customer_reviews.author: Grey Ghoster

customer_reviews.title: Really great doll
customer_reviews.text: This doll was a gift for my 4 year old daughter who calls herself “Wonder Woman’s biggest fan.” It’s beautiful and very well made. I highly recommend it for any Wonder Woman fan. My only advice is if this doll is going to be played with, don’t cut the plastic tabs around the waist of the doll...it helps to hold the sash with the golden lasso in place. I made the mistake of cutting the tab and now the sash is constantly falling off.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth J. Aronson

customer_reviews.title: JLA Barbie!
customer_reviews.text: Great figure! Well made and detailed. It was a bit difficult to remove from the box. Purchased for a collector to be displayed and not played with. This Barbie Wonder Woman appears to be a little more muscular (not as thin) than the original Batman Vs Superman version.
customer_reviews.author: Donn Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: She is Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for myself as a birthday gift. I am a huge fan of Wonder Woman and I have been after this doll for a while. I still have her in the original packaging and I do not plan on taking her out. I have her displayed! I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Great detail to the doll, not a basic barbie, I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: lisa martinez

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing details!!!
customer_reviews.text: Strong, beautiful, and feminine. This 12 inch doll has amazing details in the sculpt of the body, accessories, and the articulation is great for action poses. Truely a wonderful addition for any collector of dolls, figures, and comic memorabilia.
customer_reviews.author: Marco Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Looks like the actress, good collector doll!
customer_reviews.text: If you’re wondering why a 3 star, then you will appreciate the package inside the amazon box came with damage. While the doll wasn’t damaged, the value of the collector item is also based on package condition. It was also a gift.
customer_reviews.author: DizzyG

customer_reviews.title: my favorite. I much prefer the WWM shield
customer_reviews.text: This is the exact same doll as the BvS: Dawn of Justice one. I highly doubt that they even bothered to make new molds for this one. The Wonder Woman Movie was far and away, my favorite. I much prefer the WWM shield, too.
customer_reviews.author: Wicked Genie

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: A friend and I bought this dolls to save and put away. They're beautiful. And has great accessories. I think it would be such a nice gift for someone who's into wonder woman.
customer_reviews.author: Misty Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Great item, not the best shipping
customer_reviews.text: Great for collectors. A little disappointed in how scratched up the plastic is on the box and the inventory stickers stuck to the bottom of the box. Box was loose inside a larger box no additional packaging to keep it from getting damaged. Looks good but treatment of the box and shipping could be better.
customer_reviews.author: Mbbluestar

customer_reviews.title: Box was torn, doll isn’t that great
customer_reviews.text: Box was torn when it arrived and the doll itself isn’t that great. Her face is not very pretty and the quality of her clothes and weapons seem really cheap. Her hair is terrible - they put way too much gel stuff in it in an attempt to keep its shape and the overall length is uneven. I would not recommend and will probably return it.
customer_reviews.author: Raegrl

customer_reviews.title: WONDER WOMAN
customer_reviews.text: As a centerpiece of a Wonder Woman display, this piece...in the box...is ideal.
customer_reviews.author: Paul e. turner

customer_reviews.title: Bent box
customer_reviews.text: Love the doll but the box was bent ,bough for a gift
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: If you love Wonder Woman......
customer_reviews.text: Gift for granddaughter. Pricey for a Barbie, but understanding Wonder Woman “in” now.
customer_reviews.author: Derbygirl

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Wnder Woman
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for my granddaughter. It's all she asked for.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for Barbie & Wonder Woman fans
customer_reviews.text: Box was justva little smooshed on delivery, but otherwise couldn't be happier. Bought her as a gift for my wife, and she LOVED it.
customer_reviews.author: Erick

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful doll
customer_reviews.text: Girlfriend proudly added this to her collection. Beautiful doll, and a great addition to all things WW.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Ward

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful doll
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my granddaughter. The doll is beautiful! Great gift for a young girl!
customer_reviews.author: Ella37

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves it - plans on keeping it in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Collection Barbie
customer_reviews.text: It's a collection Barbie and it's beautiful! Totally worth the money and my daughter loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Box was arrived mashed
customer_reviews.text: I am unhappy that the box arrived mashed. This is a gift for my granddaughter's 7th birthday.
customer_reviews.author: LKjustbeme

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Xmas gift. It was really beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: I love her
customer_reviews.text: She's SO beautiful! I love Wonder Woman. I like how long the lasso is and the way she holds the sword. Very cute very cool. Hope to see more Wonder Woman dolls in the future! WW1984 Coming soon after all
customer_reviews.author: Margarita

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Like the Barbie, problem is the box is not in good condition. The box is almost as important as the doll.. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Barbiebabe

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully made doll. Really matches the mera I received earlier
customer_reviews.author: Alimee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my four year old. She loves Wonder Woman!
customer_reviews.author: EricaNicol3

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: It is a beautiful action figure and my grandbaby loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful doll :)
customer_reviews.text: My sister loved this Wonder Woman thank you guys so much! :)
customer_reviews.author: Elisha-rose

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Great return policy for damaged product. Replacement product was perfect. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: John M.

customer_reviews.title: The only complaint I have is the box that contains ...
customer_reviews.text: The only complaint I have is the box that contains the doll had a giant tear in it clear plastic window. This is suppose to be a collectible which is normally graded by the condition. But the condition is damaged.
customer_reviews.author: RLM

customer_reviews.title: Great doll
customer_reviews.text: Very nice Wonder Woman Barbie doll. My granddaughter loved her.
customer_reviews.author: Lorie

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for granddaughter.
customer_reviews.text: Collector edition Barbie Wonder Women Delivered quickly and in excellent shape.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Schlatter

customer_reviews.title: Damaged!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Barbie box came damaged. Worthless to a collector. Very upset.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Great Bargain
customer_reviews.text: It was a great Christmas present. For my little girl
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Anderson

customer_reviews.title: I give it 5 stars because the product is great, but the mailing box was crushed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife, who collects all types of dolls. The doll is exactly as expected. Unfortunately, the doll box was crushed on one side, which didn't damage the doll but reduces the value a bunch. It isn't be removed from its original box for play, it remains inside of it for display. If the doll was damaged I would ask for a replacement; kind of tough to get a replacement for the packaging. I give it 5 stars because the product is great, but the mailing box was crushed, thus the product box was crushed, and we end up with a display doll that is ugly to display and decreased the resale value.
customer_reviews.author: Frederick H Davis

customer_reviews.title: Big fan !
customer_reviews.text: I fell in love with my Wonder woman doll at first sight 😍!
customer_reviews.author: Cheshire

customer_reviews.title: Wonder Woman
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves Wonder Woman and this is her favorite doll!🥰
customer_reviews.author: Harry Bartlett

product_meta.title: Barbie Wonder Woman Doll
product_meta.description: Facing a great enemy, Wonder Woman and Batman join forces to recruit a group of meta-humans to stand against this newly awakened threat. Having formed an unprecedented league of heroes, they set out to save the planet from an assault of catastrophic proportions in Warner Bros. live-action feature film, Justice League. This Barbie Wonder Woman doll is sculpted and costumed just like the movie character. Armed for battle, this Amazon warrior wears her iconic costume with headdress, boots, armored bracelets, iconic "magic'" lasso, sword, and shield. Doll also features a fully articulated body-perfect for high-action poses.
feature_bullets: Facing a great enemy, Wonder Woman and Batman join forces to recruit a group of meta-humans to stand against this newly awakened threat
Having formed an unprecedented league of heroes, they set out to save the planet from an assault of catastrophic proportions in Warner Bros. live-action feature film, Justice League
This Barbie Wonder Woman doll is sculpted and costumed just like the movie character
Armed for battle, this Amazon warrior wears her iconic Super Hero costume with headdress, boots, armored bracelets, "magic" lasso, sword and shield
Doll also features a fully articulated body—perfect for high-action poses
